question: Who is the Chairperson of the task force, set up to examine matters regarding health and nutrition of women and children?
explanation:
As per the latest notification from the Union Women and Child Development Ministry, a ten-member task force has been set up to examine matters regarding health and nutrition of women and children.
Ms Jaya Jaitly has been named the Chairperson of the task force, which includes the Secretaries of various related Departments as ex-officio members. It will examine matters regarding age of motherhood, imperatives of lowering MMR and IMR, improvement of nutritional levels and other health and nutritional issues.
